title: Internal Cable Shoulder Rotation
description: Stand next to a cable machine with your left side facing it. Make sure the cable handle has been adjusted to the height of your lower chest. Hold the handle in your left hand. Stand tall with your chest up and core braced. Begin the movement by shifting your left hand across your body. Your left upper arm should remain in place, held close to your side. Pause once the handle has moved across your body and slowly release to the starting position.
